GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit 8293e61bbf908b18ff9935238d4fc2ad359e3fe0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()
